name: 半成品管理日产量
query:
SELECT
spo.for_date AS `日期:Date:150`,
spo.semi_product AS `半成品:Data:150`,
spo.semi_op_target AS `工序:Data:150`,
Sum(spo.finish_qty) AS `产量:Int:80`
FROM
`tabSemi Product Operate` AS spo
WHERE
TO_DAYS(NOW()) - TO_DAYS(spo.for_date) <= 32
AND
spo.finish_qty > 0
GROUP BY
spo.for_date,
spo.semi_product,
spo.semi_op_target
ORDER BY
spo.for_date DESC
LIMIT 1000
